episodes.title: Escaping the NXIVM cult: Bonnie Piesse’s Fight for Freedom to working on Star Wars
episodes.description:
Bonnie Piesse is known for her role as Beru Lars in Star Wars: Episode II and the Disney+ series Obi-Wan Kenobi, Bonnie opens up about her harrowing journey inside NXIVM — the self-described multi-level marketing company later exposed as a dangerous cult.As featured in the HBO documentary The Vow, Bonnie recounts how she found the strength to escape. Through self-trust, intuition, and a fierce inner voice, she overcame immense psychological and physical challenges to reclaim her life.From being discovered by George Lucas to surviving one of the most high-profile cults of the 21st century, Bonnie's story is one of courage, healing, and resilience.
Follow the journey:
